title: !!ONE Month FREE!! Upscale N. Lamar Pad!
posting_body: Modern living set near the heart of Austin's Historic Rosedale, Allandale, and Brentwood Neighborhoods with Easy Access to Major Highways Allows for a Quick Commute North or South to Downtown Austin!
Pet-Friendly Community with a Pet Park and spa, and walking distance to restaurants, shops, and bars!

Resort-style swimming pool with tanning ledge, fire pit, and outdoor grills for entertaining, a 5th-floor sky lounge with kitchen and billiards table and outdoor deck with city views, and a private clubroom with ping pong and serving kitchen for all of your summer plans!
Featuring an Athletic Center with cardio theatre, free weights, and spin room to help meet your fitness goals and a Secure Bike Storage to keep your gear safe!
Please don't wait long, the prices and specials are subject to change any day so give me a shout and we can lock yours down today!
Call/Text Trent to check it out now.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
